definition: (Internet slang) spoiled city girl from a rich family
(bird species of China) Hainan peacock-pheasant (Polyplectron katsumatae)
(bird species of China) grey peacock-pheasant (Polyplectron bicalcaratum)
(bird species of China) green peafowl (Pavo muticus)

sentences.english: Paul Konchesky has gone out on loan to Nottingham Forest.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀已經租借給了諾丁漢森林。

sentences.english: Peacock also is said to be able to foretell rain, and dances when rain is coming.
sentences.chinese: 據說孔雀能夠預知雨水，將要下雨的時候就會跳舞。

sentences.english: Southeast the Lovelorn Peacocks Fly is a famous long narrative poem in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 《孔雀東南飛》是一首膾炙人口的中國古代敘事長詩。

sentences.english: And there dwell in this comely garden white peacocks and peacocks that have blue breasts.
sentences.chinese: 在這秀美無比的花園裏住着白孔雀和藍胸孔雀。

sentences.english: And there dwell in this comely garden white peacocks and peacocks that have blue breasts.
sentences.chinese: 在這秀美無比的花園裏住着白孔雀和藍胸孔雀。

sentences.english: The "Crane Dance"for a long life and the "Peacock Dance"for happiness and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 鶴舞寓意長壽，孔雀舞寓意幸福與美麗。

sentences.english: Hera is the most beautiful of the immortals. Her symbols were the peacock and the cow.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉是衆神中最美麗的女神，她的象徵是孔雀和母牛。

sentences.english: The results indicated that Blue peafowl examined was abundant in genetic diversity.
sentences.chinese: 表明藍孔雀羣體遺傳多樣性豐富。

sentences.english: His head was decorated with a peacock feather.
sentences.chinese: 祂的頭上美飾着一支孔雀毛。

sentences.english: Malachite is the anniversary gemstone for the 13th year of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀石是對結婚13年週年的寶石。

sentences.english: The peacock displayed its fine tail feathers for us.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀爲我們展示了它美麗的尾羽。

sentences.english: But they come to know me, a peacock of bronze and gold.
sentences.chinese: 但他們來認識我，一銅和金孔雀。

sentences.english: The peacock spreads his splendid tail.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀展開了它那燦爛奪目的尾巴。

sentences.english: Malachite is a beautiful green earth stone with black bands.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀石是一個美麗的黑邊的綠色地球石頭。
